text: Ebela (Bengali: এবেলা) was a Bengali tabloid. The tabloid was meant for young Bengali readers in Kolkata and Howrah. It is published by ABP Group after Anandabazar Patrika. The newspaper was discontinued on 17 December 2018. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2018 disestablishments in India Category:2012 establishments in India Category:West Bengal Category:Newspapers published in India
title: Ebela
